issue.title: [CF 1536] Crash when pasting strings
issue.body:
I just tried to import some configs from chesder.com.  Every time I paste a string in to the config box, it crashes the entire game.  I tried several times with both the BfA toggles string and the mage profile string.  I checked for an update, but there is none.  I'm running 8.5.1.


> Posted by CurseForge user SirWillae | Imported from CurseForge issue #1536 | Raw

comments.body:
Nothing I can do. Copy/paste into text boxes is a feature provided by Blizzard, not me.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Exactly the same is happening to me as of today, dont knwo what changed- it was ok few days ago.
So is there no solutions to this?


> Posted by CurseForge user unaeve
